DOC.brief_summary: This is a single-assignment study to evaluate whether Omegaven (IV fish oil) is effective at treating liver disease in children on long-term IV nutrition.
DOC.brief_title: Compassionate Use of Omegaven in Children
DOC.detailed_description: Children up to 18 years of age, on parenteral nutrition, with a direct bilirubin level of 2 mg/dL or greater will be eligible to receive Omegaven at a maximum dose of 1 g/kg/day. Up to 200 children will be eligible for enrollment. Direct bilirubin levels and other labs will be monitored as well as growth parameters.
